name: part_007
file: tmp_【 3DLIVE 】#アキロゼ生誕祭2026 ーLife is GAMEー【ホロライブ⧸アキ・ローゼンタール】 [_tBlI-l8WLk]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: A mysterious male character invites Aki Rosenthal to sit and participate in a 'game' after she finds a special coin.
Transition sequence showing a board game layout and a spinning roulette wheel.

subtitles.original: このコインは…
subtitles.english: This coin is...

subtitles.original: はは… そうか。君はそっちなんだね。
subtitles.english: Haha... I see. You're on that side.

subtitles.original: そっち？
subtitles.english: That side?

subtitles.original: ここに座って。
subtitles.english: Sit here.

subtitles.original: え…
subtitles.english: Eh...

subtitles.original: この後は君次第だよ。
subtitles.english: After this, it's up to you.

subtitles.original:
Whisper Whisper Whisper
作詞・作曲：Azari
subtitles.english:
Whisper Whisper Whisper
Lyrics & Composition: Azari

subtitles.original: 忘れられないのはこの目のせい
subtitles.english: The reason I can't forget is because of these eyes

subtitles.original: 赤く残る過ち 甘噛みの跡
subtitles.english: The red mistake remaining, the mark of a love bite

subtitles.original: 溢れ出す憂いは止め処もない
subtitles.english: The overflowing sorrow is endless

subtitles.original: 誰もいない間に悪魔を唆す
subtitles.english: Tempting the devil while no one is around

subtitles.original: 作り笑いはこの耳のせい
subtitles.english: The reason for the fake smile is because of these ears

subtitles.original: 深い壁の中から呼びかける声
subtitles.english: A voice calling out from deep within the walls

subtitles.original: Whisper Whisper Whisper まだ触らせない
subtitles.english: Whisper Whisper Whisper, I won't let you touch yet

subtitles.original: この檻を抜け出して悪魔をあやかる
subtitles.english: Escaping this cage and basking in the devil's favor

subtitles.original: 鏡の前でこの口のせい
subtitles.english: In front of the mirror, because of this mouth

subtitles.original: 伝えたい言葉さえ噛み殺す夜
subtitles.english: A night where even the words I want to say are bitten back

subtitles.original: Whisper Whisper Whisper まだ打ち明けない
subtitles.english: Whisper Whisper Whisper, I won't reveal it yet

subtitles.original: 神様を裏切って悪魔と過ごす
subtitles.english: Betraying God and spending time with the devil

subtitles.original: I My Me 夢見ていたい あなたに
subtitles.english: I My Me, I want to keep dreaming, for you

subtitles.original: そっと気付かせてあげたいだけ
subtitles.english: I just want to let you know softly

subtitles.original: Oh あなたにも Oh あなたにも Oh あなたにも
subtitles.english: Oh, to you too, Oh, to you too, Oh, to you too

subtitles.original: Keep My 傷を隠したい あなたに
subtitles.english: Keep My, I want to hide my wounds, from you

subtitles.original: そっと悩ませてあげたいだけ
subtitles.english: I just want to make you worry softly

subtitles.original: Oh あなたにも Oh あなたにも
subtitles.english: Oh, to you too, Oh, to you too

subtitles.original: 悪魔を唆す
subtitles.english: Tempting the devil

subtitles.original: 作り笑いはこの耳のせい
subtitles.english: The reason for the fake smile is because of these ears

subtitles.original: 深い壁の中から呼びかける声
subtitles.english: A voice calling out from deep within the walls

subtitles.original: Whisper Whisper Whisper まだ触らせない
subtitles.english: Whisper Whisper Whisper, I won't let you touch yet

subtitles.original: この檻を抜け出して悪魔をあやかる
subtitles.english: Escaping this cage and basking in the devil's favor

subtitles.original: 鏡の前でこの口のせい
subtitles.english: In front of the mirror, because of this mouth

subtitles.original: 伝えたい言葉さえ噛み殺す夜
subtitles.english: A night where even the words I want to say are bitten back

subtitles.original: Whisper Whisper Whisper まだ打ち明けない
subtitles.english: Whisper Whisper Whisper, I won't reveal it yet

subtitles.original: 神様を裏切って悪魔と過ごす
subtitles.english: Betraying God and spending time with the devil

subtitles.original:
BANG!!!
作詞：ryo (supercell) 作曲：Giga
subtitles.english:
BANG!!!
Lyrics: ryo (supercell) Composition: Giga

subtitles.original: 好き嫌い常識 I don't care 吹っ飛べ BAN!!!
subtitles.english: Likes, dislikes, common sense, I don't care, blow it all away, BAN!!!

subtitles.original: かかって来いマジョリティ 私に負けはなし
subtitles.english: Come at me, majority, there's no losing for me

subtitles.original: ここまでって引かれた そのボーダー誰のルール
subtitles.english: That border drawn to say 'this far,' whose rule is it?

subtitles.original: あの日乗り越えたウィークポイント
subtitles.english: The weak point I overcame that day

subtitles.original: 強くなった私が笑い飛ばしてあげる
subtitles.english: The stronger me will laugh it off for you

subtitles.original: 言いたいことは言う
subtitles.english: I say what I want to say

subtitles.original: やりたくないことはしない
subtitles.english: I don't do what I don't want to do

subtitles.original: 悪意気にしない
subtitles.english: I don't care about malice

subtitles.original: みんな違うの当然だし 私も変わらない 目の前の自分
subtitles.english: It's natural everyone is different, and I won't change, the self before me

subtitles.original: (Every single day) I want to be free
subtitles.english: (Every single day) I want to be free

subtitles.original: Yes まだ終わりじゃないさ それじゃ何も変えられんな
subtitles.english: Yes, it's not over yet, if so, nothing can be changed

subtitles.original: (Every single day) I want it more
subtitles.english: (Every single day) I want it more

subtitles.original: 構わない自分勝手 生きてるんだって
subtitles.english: I don't care about being selfish, because I'm alive

subtitles.original: (BAN!!! BAN!!!) 生きてるんだって
subtitles.english: (BAN!!! BAN!!!) Because I'm alive

subtitles.original: (BAN!!! BAN!!!) ねえ生きてるんだって
subtitles.english: (BAN!!! BAN!!!) Hey, because I'm alive

subtitles.original: (BAN!!! BAN!!!) 歌えばいいのさ
subtitles.english: (BAN!!! BAN!!!) It's fine to just sing

subtitles.original: 抗え 生まれたその時から選んできた地点
subtitles.english: Resist, the point you've chosen since the moment you were born

subtitles.original: 思い出せ 私は私だ 不確かな事なんて
subtitles.english: Remember, I am myself, uncertain things

subtitles.original: 何一つない 嘘じゃない 鳴り響け自分に
subtitles.english: There's not a single one, it's not a lie, ring out to yourself

subtitles.original: 好き嫌い常識 I don't care 吹っ飛べ BAN!!!
subtitles.english: Likes, dislikes, common sense, I don't care, blow it all away, BAN!!!

subtitles.original: 好き嫌い常識 I don't care 吹っ飛べ BAN!!!
subtitles.english: Likes, dislikes, common sense, I don't care, blow it all away, BAN!!!

subtitles.original: 振る舞うならさ このリリック回さ
subtitles.english: If I'm going to act, I'll turn these lyrics

subtitles.original: わからす 挑発 下向いて舌打ちからの はっ？
subtitles.english: I'll make you understand, provocation, looking down, clicking my tongue, and then, 'huh?'

subtitles.original: Excuse me?
subtitles.english: Excuse me?
